sentences.english: Attached to provide superior layer of the substrate and enhance paint adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 提供優越的附載層，提高面塗與基材的附着力。

sentences.english: It's particularly fit for base materials with high density and somewhat absorbency.
sentences.chinese: 特別適用於材質緻密度較高且有吸收性的基材。

sentences.english: The reason why the nucleation rate is slow on the unscratched surface is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了不經劃痕處理的基材形核率低的原因。

sentences.english: The radiator includes basis material for heat elimination, and multiple guide pillars for heat elimination.
sentences.chinese: 一種散熱器，其包括散熱基材以及多個散熱導柱。

sentences.english: Cooling paste based on polyacrylate hydrogel was fabricated via radical polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 製備了以聚丙烯酸鈉爲基材的高分子水凝膠退熱貼。

sentences.english: There are water on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 基材表面有明水的地方。

sentences.english: CLOTH TAPES are made from textile fibre cloth as the backing material, and then coated with Pressure-sensitive adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 是以紡織纖維材料爲基材，塗以壓敏膠製造而成。

sentences.english: No shrinking phenomena after compounding cutting off.
sentences.chinese: 複合切斷後基材無收縮現象。

sentences.english: The polyolefin substrate layer is high-intensity polythene after crosslinked radiation.
sentences.chinese: 所述聚烯烴基材層爲經過交聯輻射的高密度聚乙烯。

sentences.english: The anti-erosion properties of the base material is one of the key factors for success of ecological slope protection.
sentences.chinese: 基材的抗侵蝕性能是生態護坡成功的關鍵因素之一。

sentences.english: The polyolefin substrate layer is high-density polyolefin after crosslinked radiation.
sentences.chinese: 所述聚烯烴基材層爲經過交聯輻射的高密度聚烯烴。

sentences.english: The method comprises providing the substrate with a wear protection layer and providing corrosion resistant layer.
sentences.chinese: 該方法包括向基材提供耐磨層和耐蝕層。

sentences.english: In first part of the dissertation, we focus on the growth of diamond on SiGe substrate.
sentences.chinese: 第一個主題是探討鑽石在矽鍺基材上的成長。

sentences.english: It is easier to combine with base materials and to disperse than antimony trioxide.
sentences.chinese: 較三氧化二銻更易於基材結合，分散更均勻。

sentences.english: A technique of moving and charging powder so that it is deposited on an earthed substrate.
sentences.chinese: 一種移動和粉末充電以便沉積在接地的基材上的技術。
以聚脂膜爲基材，塗上壓敏膠。

definition: medium-density fiberboard (MDF)/abbr. to 中纖板|中纤板[zhong1 xian1 ban3]
pinyin: zhong1 mi4 du4 xian1 wei2 ban3

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
